00051 /* Private Functions ---------------------------------------------------------- */

00053 static uint8_t WDT_SetTimeOut (uint8_t clk_source, uint32_t timeout);
00054 
00055 /********************************************************************/
00061 static uint8_t WDT_SetTimeOut (uint8_t clk_source, uint32_t timeout)
00062 {
00063 
00064         uint32_t pclk_wdt = 0;
00065         uint32_t tempval = 0;
00066 
00067         switch ((WDT_CLK_OPT) clk_source)
00068     {
00069     case WDT_CLKSRC_IRC:
00070         pclk_wdt = 4000000;
00071         // Calculate TC in WDT
00072         tempval  = (((pclk_wdt) / WDT_US_INDEX) * (timeout / 4));
00073         // Check if it valid
00074         if ((tempval >= WDT_TIMEOUT_MIN) && (tempval <= WDT_TIMEOUT_MAX))
00075         {
00076                 LPC_WDT->WDTC = tempval;
00077                 return  SUCCESS;
00078         }
00079 
00080         break;
00081 
00082     case WDT_CLKSRC_PCLK:
00083 
00084         // Get WDT clock with CCLK divider = 4
00085                 pclk_wdt = SystemCoreClock / 4;
00086                 // Calculate TC in WDT
00087                 tempval  = (((pclk_wdt) / WDT_US_INDEX) * (timeout / 4));
00088 
00089                 if ((tempval >= WDT_TIMEOUT_MIN) && (tempval <= WDT_TIMEOUT_MAX))
00090                 {
00091                         CLKPWR_SetPCLKDiv (CLKPWR_PCLKSEL_WDT, CLKPWR_PCLKSEL_CCLK_DIV_4);
00092                         LPC_WDT->WDTC = (uint32_t) tempval;
00093                         return SUCCESS;
00094                 }
00095 
00096                 // Get WDT clock with CCLK divider = 2
00097                 pclk_wdt = SystemCoreClock / 2;
00098                 // Calculate TC in WDT
00099                 tempval  = (((pclk_wdt) / WDT_US_INDEX) * (timeout / 4));
00100 
00101                 if ((tempval >= WDT_TIMEOUT_MIN) && (tempval <= WDT_TIMEOUT_MAX))
00102                 {
00103                         CLKPWR_SetPCLKDiv (CLKPWR_PCLKSEL_WDT, CLKPWR_PCLKSEL_CCLK_DIV_2);
00104                         LPC_WDT->WDTC = (uint32_t) tempval;
00105                         return  SUCCESS;
00106                 }
00107 
00108                 // Get WDT clock with CCLK divider = 1
00109                 pclk_wdt = SystemCoreClock;
00110                 // Calculate TC in WDT
00111                 tempval  = (((pclk_wdt) / WDT_US_INDEX) * (timeout / 4));
00112 
00113                 if ((tempval >= WDT_TIMEOUT_MIN) && (tempval <= WDT_TIMEOUT_MAX))
00114                 {
00115                         CLKPWR_SetPCLKDiv (CLKPWR_PCLKSEL_WDT, CLKPWR_PCLKSEL_CCLK_DIV_1);
00116                         LPC_WDT->WDTC = (uint32_t) tempval;
00117                         return  SUCCESS;
00118                 }
00119                 break ;
00120 
00121 
00122     case WDT_CLKSRC_RTC:
00123                 pclk_wdt = 32768;
00124                 // Calculate TC in WDT
00125                 tempval  = (((pclk_wdt) / WDT_US_INDEX) * (timeout / 4));
00126                 // Check if it valid
00127                 if ((tempval >= WDT_TIMEOUT_MIN) && (tempval <= WDT_TIMEOUT_MAX))
00128                 {
00129                         LPC_WDT->WDTC = (uint32_t) tempval;
00130                         return  SUCCESS;
00131                 }
00132 
00133                 break;
00134 
00135 // Error parameter
00136                 default:
00137                         break;
00138 }
00139 
00140         return ERROR;
00141 }
00142

00146 /* Public Functions ----------------------------------------------------------- */
00152 /*********************************************************************/
00164 void WDT_Init (WDT_CLK_OPT ClkSrc, WDT_MODE_OPT WDTMode)
00165 {
00166         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_WDT_CLK_OPT(ClkSrc));
00167         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_WDT_MODE_OPT(WDTMode));
00168         CLKPWR_SetPCLKDiv (CLKPWR_PCLKSEL_WDT, CLKPWR_PCLKSEL_CCLK_DIV_4);
00169 
00170         //Set clock source
00171         LPC_WDT->WDCLKSEL &= ~WDT_WDCLKSEL_MASK;
00172         LPC_WDT->WDCLKSEL |= ClkSrc;
00173         //Set WDT mode
00174         if (WDTMode == WDT_MODE_RESET){
00175                 LPC_WDT->WDMOD |= WDT_WDMOD(WDTMode);
00176         }
00177 }
00178 
00179 /*********************************************************************/
00184 void WDT_Start(uint32_t TimeOut)
00185 {
00186         uint32_t ClkSrc;
00187 
00188         ClkSrc = LPC_WDT->WDCLKSEL;
00189         ClkSrc &=WDT_WDCLKSEL_MASK;
00190         WDT_SetTimeOut(ClkSrc,TimeOut);
00191         //enable watchdog
00192         LPC_WDT->WDMOD |= WDT_WDMOD_WDEN;
00193         WDT_Feed();
00194 }
00195 
00196 /********************************************************************/
00201 FlagStatus WDT_ReadTimeOutFlag (void)
00202 {
00203         return ((FlagStatus)((LPC_WDT->WDMOD & WDT_WDMOD_WDTOF) >>2));
00204 }
00205 
00206 /********************************************************************/
00211 void WDT_ClrTimeOutFlag (void)
00212 {
00213         LPC_WDT->WDMOD &=~WDT_WDMOD_WDTOF;
00214 }
00215 
00216 /********************************************************************/
00221 void WDT_UpdateTimeOut ( uint32_t TimeOut)
00222 {
00223         uint32_t ClkSrc;
00224         ClkSrc = LPC_WDT->WDCLKSEL;
00225         ClkSrc &=WDT_WDCLKSEL_MASK;
00226         WDT_SetTimeOut(ClkSrc,TimeOut);
00227         WDT_Feed();
00228 }
00229 
00230 
00231 /********************************************************************/
00238 void WDT_Feed (void)
00239 {
00240         // Disable irq interrupt
00241         __disable_irq();
00242         LPC_WDT->WDFEED = 0xAA;
00243         LPC_WDT->WDFEED = 0x55;
00244         // Then enable irq interrupt
00245         __enable_irq();
00246 }
00247 
00248 /********************************************************************/
00253 uint32_t WDT_GetCurrentCount(void)
00254 {
00255         return LPC_WDT->WDTV;
00256 }
